species.name: gligar
descriptions: Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then injects the prey with its poison barb.
It builds its nest on a steep cliff. When it is done gliding, it hops along the ground back to its nest.
It clamps on to its chosen prey then jabs the stinger on its tail into the prey while it’s stunned with surprise.
It flies straight at its target's face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
It glides as if sliding. It startles foes by clamping on to their faces, then jabs with its poison stinger.

abilities.name: hyper-cutter
abilities.effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
